group_1.narration: It took me a long time to realize just how@many feelings everyone kept locked inside.
I know it's not really the next part, but I think we should pick@things up from when we saved Kaedeâ€•back in that last story.
After Rena started to embrace how she really felt,@she went into the [textBlue:Rumor]'s domain to save Kaede.
But she got so tripped up in her own messy feelings that@she couldn't even move once actually inside the [textBlue:Rumor]...!
And who showed up? Kaede, the same as ever... She's the one@who ended up saving me when I was supposed to save her...!
I really was gonna say sorry, but being saved by Kaede was soo@embarrassing... I just ended up acting all cold again.
But Rena thought that was okay.
Kaede always forgives me, even when I act tough...and yeah,@it really gets on my nerves. But I could never hate her.
I'm glad Kaede's okay...and knowing she feels the same about me@somehow makes me feel even more reassured.
Things might be a bit messy...@but that's just the kind of bond we have.
If I'd been more honest, I would've told Kaede properly@that I still wanted us to be friends.
Knowing just how you really feel doesn't mean@that it's easy for you to act on it, too...
Kaede saw right through such a troublesome Rena@and still told her we were friends.
Yet I still couldn't get myself to tell Kaede the truth.
I'm sure we thought this kind of relationship would be@just fine, just like this, from now on.
I thought that was the end of it, but...
Right when I was finally happy...@Kaede suddenly disappeared, not long after.
That's what finally opened my eyes to how@everyone around me had really been doing...
I genuinely thought I had figured out@not just myself, but Kaede, too.
But really, there was no way that could've ever been true.@Rena was just fooling herself.
Rena didn't understand even the tiniest bit@of what Kaede was going through.
